meanings.definition: To have a portion of something with others.
meanings.sent1: I will share my toys with my friends.
meanings.sent2: Let's share the cake equally among all the guests.
meanings.sent3: The siblings decided to share the last piece of pizza in a fair way.
meanings.sent4: She always shares her wisdom with those in need.
meanings.sent5: Sharing is caring, as they say.

meanings.definition: To divide something into parts and distribute them.
meanings.sent1: We can share the candies among the children.
meanings.sent2: The teacher will share the worksheets for the group project.
meanings.sent3: The magician will share the deck of cards for his next trick.
meanings.sent4: The chef will share the ingredients evenly for the recipe.
meanings.sent5: Let's share the workload to finish the task faster.

meanings.definition: A portion or part of something that is divided and distributed.
meanings.sent1: Each person will get an equal share of the profits.
meanings.sent2: The company's shares are performing well in the market.
meanings.sent3: The children argued over who had the bigger share of the cake.
meanings.sent4: She bought shares in the tech company last year.
meanings.sent5: His share of the responsibility is to clean up after dinner.
